titleStmt.title: Ymofynion iw hatteb gan brocatorion, wardeinied, a swyddogion eraill, ymwelied escobol gyntaf y gwir barchedig dad Humphrey Humphreys, Escob Bangor, yn y flwyddyn o oedran Jesu, 1690.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Bangor. Bishop (1689-1701 : Humphreys)

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of originals in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
Item at 2670:6b is bound with: Gan fod y Ffurf Gweddi gyda Diolch ... [S.l. : s.n., 1685].
